attributes.action: help those in Hard Water areas who suffer skin problems as a result.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many areas in England and Wales have hard water flowing into their homes. 

Hard Water can be the cause of some people in England and Wales getting dry and irritated skin as a result of Hard Water. Leading to skin problems such as eczema and Rosacea.

The Government should look to providing water softening equipment to households who have this problem. Or should look to trying to soften the water in areas where there is extreme hardness in water, such as London.

The benefits of Soft Water outweigh those of Hard Water. The Government should look at this.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
